text: The Buick GL6 is a compact Minivan made by Buick from 2017 to 2023. == History and Features == The Buick GL6 was launched in 2017. It is positioned below the Buick GL8 as a cheaper alternative. It has 6-seats. The GL6 has a 1.3 liter turbo petrol engine with a 6-speed automatic transmission. It was improved in 2021.https://www.carscoops.com/2020/11/buicks-china-only-2021-gl6-minivan- gets-mild-hybrid-powertrain-new- tech/#:~:text=Buick%20has%20revamped%20the%20GL6,launch%20it%20on%20November%2019. == Markets == The Buick GL6 was sold only in China during its entire production run. == Discontinuation == The production of The GL6 ended in 2023. The Minivan was then discontinued without a sucessor. == References == GL6 Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Buick GL6
